mentions.context: Training Phases All our models are trained using ADAM [Kingma and Ba, 2015] with a batch size of 128 and a learning rate of 2e-4 for 20 epochs.

For the sake of extensiveness and to make sure we did not draw results from some parser biases, we also report the same heatmaps but using UDPipe 2.0 [Straka, 2018], which uses UD type annotations10 , in Figures 13 and14.
